ingredients.ingredient: 1 glazed raised ring doughnut, halved horizontally

cookingTips: Use medium-low heat to melt cheese without burning the glaze
Place cheese between doughnut halves for even melting
Serve immediately while cheese is melted and glaze is warm
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This sweet-savory sandwich pairs glazed doughnuts with creamy Gouda. What other cheese would work well with this combination?
